Zachary J. Leonardo

Aspiring Software Engineer

Hello, welcome to my website! I'm currently studying for my bachelors degree in computer science at Allegheny College. I've been fascinated by computers since I was a teenager, so computer science was an obvious fit. Since attending college, I've also peaked interest in the graphs and relevance of economics to which I chose to be my minor.

I am currently employeed at Geisinger Medical Center as a foodservice worker and have been for the last 2 years. As an occasional B-code lead I am responsible for supervising the processes and food service team on a daily basis. I am also on the executive board for Gator Activities Programming as the current VP of Internal Operations.

Personal Interests:

  • Music. Throughout my life I have always enjoyed listening and creating music through various instruments. As the streaming age of music has grown into what it is today so has my opportunities to get involved with it.

  • Hiking. As a kid growing up in rural central Pennsylvania there isn't much to do except explore. Nowadays I enjoy spending weekends on nature trails and finding new parks and lookouts all over the state.

Future Goals/Projects:

  • My current project involves a Python program integrated with google sheets to assist my responsibilities for GAP

  • I plan on continuing to develope in Python and Java but also learning other lucrative langugages such as JavaScript

  • This summer I hope to secure an software engineering internship in the application development or data science sphere.
